title: Week 17 Waivers + Trey or Nay, Owl’s Funeral - Fantasy Football Podcast for 12/28
description:
Week 17 Waiver Wire! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode as we enter into fantasy football championship week! On today’s fantasy football podcast, waiver pickups and QB streamers! Plus, a recap of the Monday Night game between the Dolphins and Saints, and a new edition of “Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for December 28th, 2021.
  
 (00:00) - Monday Night Recap
 (09:30) - Where There’s Smoke, There’s Fire
 (17:35) - NFL News
 (30:35) - Week 16 Waivers
 (32:15) - WR Waivers
 (42:30) - RB Waivers
 (52:20) - TE Waivers
 (56:00) - DST Streamers
 (58:55) - QB Streamers
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web

 Follow on Instagram
  
 Check out today's sponsors:
